settings.subtitle: How it Works
settings.title: The first six weeks after childbirth is a key window of time for nourishment and restoration for the mother.
settings.text:
Ancient wisdom traditions believe that the first 42 days after birth can impact the next 42 years. Modern studies focus on the positive impact of implementing certain nutrients to curb postpartum depletion.

We believe food has the capacity to heal. Influenced by cultures around the globe alongside respect for the science supporting proper nutrient intake, we provide essential nourishment for the weeks after childbirth so that you may restore.
settings.content-bottom-title: Serving the San Francisco Bay Area!

settings.subtitle: Key Nutrients
settings.title: Key Nutrients for Postpartum
settings.text: At Milky Oat, our mission is to nourish mothers with the nutrients needed to restore the postpartum body. Here are some of the key components of our meals:
